posts.post_content:
I'm looking for really strong photos in N172s.  Preferably N173 cabinet cards.

I have some better main stream 20th century HOFers to trade or will pay cash money.

Please PM.  thanks so much.  -peter



HOFers Needed:

Pud Galvin
Jim O'Rourke
Sam Thompson

I thought I'd bump in case any one would at least like to start a conversation about a possible transaction. 

Maybe I can make you an offer for you to consider for when you're ready to sell?

Thanks.

peter
Hey Pete, I don't think you'd really like the Nichols n300, probably be best to look for a different card...

Bumper.

 I'd really lIke to add these to my collection.  Thanks for any help.
